title: Will the new SAT be easier or harder? What will the pros and cons be, and why are they changing the format? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here is an interesting comparison of the two tests, which can help you see the pros and cons of both. Easier or harder is in the eyes of the beholder. I think I would find it easier. But I also found the ACT to be easier than the SAT, while most of my friends did best on the SAT. http://blog.prepscholar.com/should-you-take-the-new-sat-or-old-sat They are changing the format because colleges argue that the test is not useful in determining whether a student is fit for college, and because if all colleges stopped caring about the test, the College Board would lose its chief source of revenue, and no profiting business wants that.
